about_the_game:
We know what you’re thinking, the age-old question: what would happen if we put your stereotypical quick witty, gun tot-in, sunglasses-wearing, chain-smoking action hero in the universe of a horror game? The answer lies in Overage - Child of Chaos. This is a game that thrives on adaptability, allowing you to find guns that can do anything from permanently setting demons on fire and electricuting them through walls, to turning you into a furry!

Explore a beautiful, futuristic 2.5D world that encompasses platforming, satire, and shooting lots of guns! Don't get too comfortable though, the world of Morning Town is a dreadful place; overrun by demons and other things that go "bump" in the night. You must exercise caution, for there can be danger lurking on each end of the screen... and there are plenty of creatures lurking in the darkness... some big and some small... but all of them are hungry and ready to sink their teeth into your flesh.

So are you ready to kick some bubblegum and chew A**?

content_descriptors.notes: This game is not yet rated by ESRB. However, it currently contains: blood and gore, strong language, and violence; we expect it to contain strong sexual themes, and drug and alcohol consumption in future updates of the game.

Don't get too comfortable though, the world of Morning Town is a dreadful place; overrun by demons and other things that go "bump" in the night.   • Processor: 1.65GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBA

  • Storage: 1.46 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBA

short_description: Overage - Child of Chaos is a fast-paced rougelike shooter set in a horrific 2.5D environment; your only goal is to kill as many demons as you can, in the most violent ways imaginable, using the most overpowered guns possible! You will most likely be able to have a gun that shoots electic guitars!
